content: Thanks! That's enormously helpful and has gotten me well past where I was stuck, but I don't understand why it works. What about my original formulation of the problem was preventing rw [‚Üê Int.sub_sub] from succeeding?

Since decide also takes a Decidable argument, which was not being rewritten, and caused a type mismatch when the rewritten argument to decide was conflicting with the non-rewritten Decidable instance.
Zack Weinberg has marked this topic as resolved.
